us.phonetic: /v. ˈɔltɚˌneɪt, ˈæl-; adj., n. -nɪt/, (v. ôl′tər nāt′, al′-; adj., n. ôl′tər nit, al′-)

example.eg: Jodie and I can't both play the drums at the same time, so we'll have to alternate.
In some spas, people alternate between hot and cold baths.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 时而...时而..., 在...和...中交替进行

example.eg: Shannon alternated with Joan as pitcher in the big game.
In this part of the song, we will alternate playing loudly and and playing softly.
example.egtrans: 我们将刚柔交替地演奏歌曲的这个部分。

example.eg: I stay interested in exercising by alternating running with swimming.
The weather forecast for the day of the barbeque is alternate periods of sun and rain.
example.egtrans: 天气预报报告烧烤日将是晴雨交替。

example.eg: I visit my mother on alternate Wednesdays.
An alternate option is to go to the park.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 替补的, 另外备用的

example.eg: Tom will sing the solo, with Ryan as his alternate.
